info.task: navigate backwards to a mixed checkbox
info.title: Navigate backwards to a mixed checkbox in interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusAfterFirstCheckbox
setupScript.description: set focus on a link after the checkbox
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link after the first checkbox
testPageDocument.querySelector('#afterlink').focus();

user: With focus on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the  'All condiments' checkbox.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the  'All condiments' checkbox.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.
